topic.title: Chapter Four
topic.shortdesc: The Ugly Duckling sees no end to this journey.

body.p: The journey was not easy for the ugly duckling. He endured cold nights and rainy days, searching for food and shelter.
One day, he stumbled upon a kind old woman who took him in, providing him with warmth and food. But even in her home, he felt like an outcast. Her cat hissed at him and the other animals ignored him.
